message: Classes start first week of May Contact # 9845012345
title2Caption:
At RocketPrep.in,  our endaevor is to connect best global talent with students in India. In order to choose for top talent from companies like Google, Amazon , Tower Research, MS , Direct i we look at two things .
	   Firstly, the expert should be willing to spend some time each week with the students and enabling them on the same successful journey that he/she ventured upon.
	    Secondly, they should feel it is a good way to give back to the student community at large and also sharpening their skills
title3Caption:
We work on a  connect of 3-3-2 , where in each week there would be 2 problem solving sessions of 3 hours each followed by weekly office hours sessions where doubts from across all the batches will be brainstormed with experts.
	  Such a format will enable students to quickly grasp the toughest Algo , DS and computer science fundamentals that are very necessary to crack an interview at top tech firms.
title4Caption:
With RocketPrep.in, we built a training platform to provide working professionals and final year students with proactive suggestions on how they can take their selection process to the next level.Since this is a web platform connectivity from anywhere across the globe is not an issue.
	 If you are a college student and would like to have this program rolled out in your college as well , do call us at the number mentioned on the top of your screen
